title: Understanding Self-Harm
text: Self-harm is often misunderstood. It is not always linked to suicidal intentions but is a way some individuals cope with emotional pain.

title: Coping Mechanism
text: People may engage in self-harm to manage overwhelming emotions or to feel a sense of control over their body.

hintAnswer: a behavior that involves deliberately causing harm to one’s own body as a way to cope with emotional distress or regain a sense of control
title: Identifying Self-Harm
text: Which of the following best describes self-harm?
choices: thoughts, fantasies, or preoccupations with suicide. It can range from fleeting thoughts of ending one’s life to detailed plans, with specific details on the timing or execution
a behavior that involves deliberately causing harm to one’s own body as a way to cope with emotional distress or regain a sense of control
a behavior that involves deliberately causing harm to one’s own body due to mental illness
